Radiocarbon in the Earth System 2017

Paleo environments and modeling

Friday Sep 29

We will have lectures on paleo applications, and time to discuss practical problems with the instructors. At the end of the day, we will hand out certificates.

Day schedule

9:00-10:00, Paleo environments | John Southon

10:00-10:30, Coffee break

10:30-11:30, Compound specific radiocarbon | Valerie Schwab

11:30-12:30, Example applications | Gerd Gleixner, Brett Walker

12:30-13:30, Lunch break

13:30-14:00, Discussion problem set 3 | Carlos Sierra

15:00-15:30, Coffee break

15:30-17:00, Discussion and question time
